Our economy is struggling and our national government is awash in a sea of debt. Amidst these struggles, some would have us focus our energies on jobs and spending, Mike Pence , an Indiana Republican, told the thousands of activists who gathered in Washington to march to the Supreme Court to protest the 38th anniversary of Roe vs. Wade. Desmond Bishop stepped into the picture and with a mighty one-handed swipe took DeSean Jackson down with a shoestring tackle at the Packers' 38-yard line. "That was big," Packers defensive end Ryan Pickett said. Actually it saved the game. That's a touchdown-saving tackle. Thanks to Desmond Bishop , DeSean Jackson was stopped in his tracks after a 28-yard reception. Four plays later Eagles quarterback Michael Vick threw his fateful interception to Tramon Williams in the end zone to seal the Packers' 21-16 victory

Treatment of dialysis patients is paid for by Medicare, the U.S. health insurance program, which has imposed a new program to control costs. We think Amgen's pricing power will help offset any decline in the proportion of Aranesp sales derived from the U.S. dialysis market where Medicare bundling rules are being adopted, Eric Schmidt said in his note today. SKY PRESENTERS APOLOGISE FOR SEXIST COMMENTS Sky football presenters Andy Coulson Gray and Richards Keys have issued apologies after being caught by an open microphone making off-air comments about lineswoman Sian Massey ( above) at the Wolves-Liverpool game on Saturday. Somebody better get down there and explain offside to her, Keys said. "Can you believe that?" Gray responded. "A female linesman. Women don Â¹ t know the offside rule."
